Name: Scorched Debts
Phase105Description: I've found an unsettling ledger of names. Who does this belong to?
Phase114Description: Lyruk wants to attempt to summon the demonic owner of the ledger. It is an extremely dangerous plan, but the only one we have.
Phase12Description: The ledger refused the flames, and instead exploded in demonic magic! I must defend myself from these creatures.
Phase15Description: Lyruk wants to attempt to summon the demonic owner of the ledger. It is an extremely dangerous plan, but the only one we have.
Phase21Description: I should ask around Ked Bardu to see if anyone recognizes this ledger.
I've found an unsettling ledger of names: : . I should find her and see what she knows of this book.
Phase59Description: I should ask around Ked Bardu to see if anyone recognizes this ledger.
Phase62Description: I should ask around Ked Bardu to see if anyone recognizes this ledger.
Phase68Description: Apparently a man named Lyruk found this ledger while on an archeological dig. Worryingly, his name is also the next entry in the book. I should find him and see what he knows.
Phase69Description: Lyruk has begged me to burn the book in his campfire. It must be destroyed before it can cause more chaos.
Phase70Description: Apparently a man named Lyruk found this ledger while on an archeological dig. Worryingly, his name is also the next entry in the book. I should find him and see what he knows.
Phase77Description: The ledger refused the flames, and instead exploded in demonic magic! Perhaps Lyruk has another idea to destroy this cursed book.
Phase9Description:
Andreea flew into a terrified rage when I showed her the ledger. I was forced to defend myself, but when she fell, her body was consumed in hellfire! This book is clearly more than it appears. 

Andreea mentioned finding the book in Ked Bardu. Someone there must know more.
Toast: A strange smoldering book lays abandoned.
